RTC001_HandleType Struct Reference

Detailed Description

RTC001 App Handle structure. Stores a few parameters configured in App UI.

Definition at line 214 of file RTC001.h.

bool RTC001_HandleType::RTCInitOnce

If value of this flag is 1, then RTC time value will be initialized only once even after system reset
